scripts.grpc-lib-gen: npm run grpc-lib-gen:backend && npm run grpc-lib-gen:frontend
scripts.db:restore: npm run db:user:restore && npm run db:status:restore && npm run db:task:restore && npm run db:board:restore
scripts.db:user:restore: docker exec user-postgres psql -U postgres -d postgres -f /home/api/user/db/dump/user.sql
scripts.db:status:restore: docker exec todo-postgres psql -U postgres -d postgres -f /home/api/todo/db/dump/status.sql
scripts.db:task:restore: docker exec todo-postgres psql -U postgres -d postgres -f /home/api/todo/db/dump/task.sql
scripts.db:board:restore: docker exec todo-postgres psql -U postgres -d postgres -f /home/api/todo/db/dump/board.sql
